Name: Johan Daniel
description:
Johan Daniel is a young coffee farmer from Morales, Cauca, with more than 14 years of experience working in this activity. He currently owns a two-hectare plot of land that was gifted by his grandfather when he was just 16 years old, where he distributes 10,000 export quality coffee trees which he sells to international distributors. Besides his crops, Johan also works at an internet caf√© to supplement his monthly income.

Johan lives with his younger sister in a house given to him by his mother. His sister works as a janitor for a local company in their municipality and constantly supports him in his crop maintenance.

A loan of $1,823,727 COP helps Johan to purchase organic fertilizers and compost that will potentiate the quality of his coffee crops.
